change.description: Change revia on tsadi to zaqef qatan.
change.refuni: vav dagesh mem patah tsadi dagesh hiriq revia lamed
change.changeuni: vav dagesh mem patah tsadi dagesh hiriq zaqef-qatan lamed

notes.note: BHL has a zaqef qatan over the tsadi. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Possible dagesh in alef. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: lamed sheva alef patah etnahta tet
change.changeuni: lamed sheva alef patah etnahta tet

notes.note: The putative dagesh is well-sized and well-positioned, but reddish. Alefs normally do not have dageshes.
BHL has no dagesh in the alef. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh in the alef.

change.description: Possible sheva on yod. Add note 't'
change.refuni: alef segol pe sheva resh patah pashta yod hiriq final-mem pashta
change.changeuni: alef segol pe sheva resh patah pashta yod hiriq final-mem pashta

notes.note: The putative upper sheva dot on the yod is well-sized, reddish and positioned to the right of the lower dot.
BHL has hireq on the yod. BHL Appendix A has a sheva on the yod.

change.description: Possible dagesh in samekh. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: mem hiriq kaf dagesh hiriq samekh sheva alef vav holam tav qamats zaqef-qatan final-mem
change.changeuni: mem hiriq kaf dagesh hiriq samekh sheva alef vav holam tav qamats zaqef-qatan final-mem

notes.note: The dageshes in both the kaf and the samekh are of poor quality. The dagesh in the samekh is reddish and slightly larger.
BHL has no dagesh in the samekh. BHL Appendix A has no note on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from bet.
change.refuni: nun hiriq kaf sheva bet dagesh patah dalet dagesh tsere yod maqaf
change.changeuni: nun hiriq kaf sheva bet patah dalet dagesh tsere yod maqaf

notes.note: An unusual, short, northeast-to-southwest inclined line occurs at the top of the yod.
BHL has a dagesh in the bet. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the bet. Both the BHL and BHL Appendix A end this word with a maqaf.

change.description: Move mahapakh from nun to dalet.
change.refuni: vav sheva nun qamats mahapakh dalet vav holam shin shin-dot
change.changeuni: vav sheva nun qamats dalet mahapakh vav holam shin shin-dot

notes.note: The mahapakh is well-removed from the nun.
BHL has the mahapakh on the dalet. BHL Appendix A has no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from nun.
change.refuni: vav sheva he patah nun dagesh hiriq dalet dagesh qamats het hiriq tipeha yod final-mem
change.changeuni: vav sheva he patah nun hiriq dalet dagesh qamats het hiriq tipeha yod final-mem

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh in the nun. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the nun.

change.description: Remove dagesh from mem.
change.refuni: vav sheva he patah mem dagesh patah samekh dagesh tsere kaf qamats merkha he
change.changeuni: vav sheva he patah mem patah samekh dagesh tsere kaf qamats merkha he

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh in the mem. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the mem.

change.description: Add patah under yod.
change.refuni: vav hiriq meteg yod shin sin-dot patah dalet dagesh tsere tipeha dalet
change.changeuni: vav hiriq meteg yod patah shin sin-dot patah dalet dagesh tsere tipeha dalet

notes.note: BHL has no patah under the yod. BHL Appendix A has a patah under the yod.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: resh patah bet maqaf
change.changeuni: resh patah bet

notes.note: The gap between the bet and the shin is a good word space as recognized in BHL Appendix A. This leaves this word without an accent, however.
BHL has a maqaf after the bet. BHL Appendix A has a space rather than a maqaf after the bet.

change.description: Remove dagesh from tet.
change.refuni: he patah bet dagesh hiriq tet dagesh qamats het tevir vav holam final-nun
change.changeuni: he patah bet dagesh hiriq tet qamats het tevir vav holam final-nun

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh in the tet. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the tet.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: resh patah bet maqaf
change.changeuni: resh patah bet

notes.note: The maqaf of the preceding word is clear; this word has no maqaf.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no maqaf after the bet.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: resh patah bet maqaf
change.changeuni: resh patah bet

notes.note: BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no maqaf after the bet.

change.description: Examine maqaf at end of word. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: resh patah bet maqaf
change.changeuni: resh patah bet maqaf

notes.note: The image shows a slight horizontal shape on the leading fork of the shin. Other local shins do not have similar shapes on the leading fork.
BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no comment on this word.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav sheva het patah yod dagesh qamats tav zaqef-qatan vav holam
change.changeuni: vav sheva het patah yod qamats tav zaqef-qatan vav holam

notes.note: The yod appears to have been redrawn, but has no dagesh.
BHL has a dagesh in the yod. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the yod.

change.description: Consider replacing qadma with pashta.
change.refuni: he hataf-patah yod holam alef mem patah qadma resh
change.changeuni: he hataf-patah yod holam alef mem patah qadma resh

notes.note: Pashtas are postfix accents; if a word has a single pashta it must be written at the end of the word. If a word has two pashtas at one of them must occur on the last consonant of the word; the non-postfix pashta is sometimes called an accent helper pashta. A pashta is normally written on the left side of its consonant; however, with hand written text this positioning on the consonant is NOT determinant. A qadma is normally written over the center of the consonant. Positioning of a pashta or qadma is difficult only when the accent occurs on the last letter. Since the accent in question does not appear on the last letter and the last consonant does not have a pashta this accent is a qadma.
BHL has a qadma over the mem. BHL Appendix A has no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove sheva from samekh.
change.refuni: mem vav holam samekh sheva resh tsere munah yod
change.changeuni: mem vav holam samekh resh tsere munah yod

notes.note: BHL has a sheva under the samekh. BHL Appendix A has no sheva under the samekh.

change.description: Add dagesh to the alef.
change.refuni: mem hiriq nun dagesh holam alef qamats meteg final-tsadi sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem hiriq nun dagesh holam alef dagesh qamats meteg final-tsadi sof-pasuq

notes.note: The dagesh in the alef is unusual, but dark, well-sized, and well-positioned.
BHL has no dagesh in the alef. BHL Appendix A has dagesh in the alef.

change.description: Possible erased yod between tsadi and resh.
change.refuni: tsadi hiriq resh patah pashta yod hiriq final-kaf sheva pashta
change.changeuni: tsadi hiriq resh patah pashta yod hiriq final-kaf sheva pashta

notes.note: The quality of the text in this region is poor. Although sufficient space exists between the tsadi and the resh for a yod, the evidence is insufficient to insert a yod.
BHL has no consonant between the tsadi and the resh. BHL Appendix A has a yod between the tsadi and the resh and adds a (p.m.) note indicating the yod may have been originally present, then erased.

change.description: Move tipeha from final kaf to tav.
change.refuni: vav segol he hataf-segol mem hiriq yod tav sheva final-kaf qamats tipeha
change.changeuni: vav segol he hataf-segol mem hiriq yod tav sheva tipeha final-kaf qamats

notes.note: BHL has the tipeha on the final kaf. BHL Appendix A has the tipeha on the tav.

change.description: Move pashta from first yod to second yod.
change.refuni: he qamats yod hiriq pashta yod tav hiriq yod pashta
change.changeuni: he qamats yod hiriq yod pashta tav hiriq yod pashta

notes.note: BHL has a pashta over the first yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from dalet.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh patah resh sheva kaf dagesh tsere tipeha final-kaf sheva
change.changeuni: dalet patah resh sheva kaf dagesh tsere tipeha final-kaf sheva

notes.note: The dalet has a rafe over it, confirming that it doesn't have a dagesh. The UXLC shows rafe accents in special situations; this is not a special situation.
BHL has no dagesh in the dalet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change patah to hataf patah under alef.
change.refuni: vav dagesh mem tsere alef patah het hataf-patah resh patah tipeha yod
change.changeuni: vav dagesh mem tsere alef hataf-patah het hataf-patah resh patah tipeha yod

notes.note: The space between the elements of the hataf patah (sheva, patah) is larger than expected. Both elements are distinct and dark.
BHL has a patah under the alef. BHL Appendix A has a hataf patah under the alef.

change.description: Change hiriq under mem to sheva.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva mem hiriq shin shin-dot sheva pe dagesh qamats munah tet
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva mem sheva shin shin-dot sheva pe dagesh qamats munah tet

notes.note: BHL has a sheva under the bet and a hireq under the mem. BHL Appendix A has a sheva under both the bet and the mem.

change.description: Remove dagesh from samekh.
change.refuni: mem hiriq meteg samekh dagesh qubuts bet dagesh sheva kaf zaqef-qatan vav holam
change.changeuni: mem hiriq meteg samekh qubuts bet dagesh sheva kaf zaqef-qatan vav holam

notes.note: The putative dagesh in the samekh is diffuse and not as dark as the dagesh in the bet.
BHL has a dagesh in the samekh. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the samekh and adds a '?'.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: ayin patah lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: ayin patah lamed

notes.note: BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Move qamats from yod to nun.
change.refuni: bet hiriq nun yod qamats mem hiriq revia final-nun
change.changeuni: bet hiriq nun qamats yod mem hiriq revia final-nun

notes.note: The usual marking for this word, Benjamin, is with a sheva under the nun and a qamats under the yod.
BHL has a sheva under the nun and qamats under the yod. BHL Appendix A has a qamats under the nun and nothing under the yod.

change.description: Remove sheva on the ayin.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot qamats mem patah merkha ayin sheva nun vav dagesh
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot qamats mem patah merkha ayin nun vav dagesh

notes.note: BHL has a sheva on the ayin. BHL Appendix A has no sheva on the ayin.

change.description: Change merkha under qof to tipeha.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah mem dagesh qamats qof merkha vav holam final-mem
change.changeuni: bet dagesh patah mem dagesh qamats qof tipeha vav holam final-mem

notes.note: BHL has a tipeha on the qof. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Replace zaqef qatan with revia. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva meteg nun qamats alef holam zaqef-qatan final-pe
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg nun qamats alef holam revia final-pe

notes.note: The text is in bad condition for this word. The markings above the alef are hard to recognize. The image more nearly supports a revia rather than a zaqef qatan.
BHL has a zaqef-qatan on the alef. BHL Appendix A has a revia on the alef and a '?' note.

change.description: Examine for possible dagesh belonging to the first vav.
change.refuni: he hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh patah het hataf-patah vav tipeha vav dagesh
change.changeuni: he hiriq meteg shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh patah het hataf-patah vav tipeha vav dagesh

notes.note: The quality of the text in this region is poor. In question is the bump on the leading edge of the second vav; it might possibly be a dagesh on the first vav. Note a similar bump occurs on the inner, left leg of the preceding tav.
BHL has no dagesh on the first vav; it has a dagesh on the second vav. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh on the first and second vavs.

change.description: Examine for possible revia on gimel. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva ayin qamats gimel zaqef-qatan vav dagesh resh
change.changeuni: vav sheva ayin qamats gimel zaqef-qatan vav dagesh resh

notes.note: The quality of the text in this region is poor. The mark above the gimel has a slight vertical orientation and is likely to have been a zaqef qatan.
BHL has zaqef qatan on the gimel. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change revia on the second samekh to zaqef qatan.
change.refuni: samekh vav dagesh samekh qamats revia yod vav
change.changeuni: samekh vav dagesh samekh qamats revia yod vav

notes.note: The accent on the second samekh has two dots. Compare with the zaqef qatan of the following line shown below the first samekh.
BHL has zaqef qatan on the samekh. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add a dagesh to the tsadi.
change.refuni: he patah tsadi hataf-qamats resh hiriq yod pashta
change.changeuni: he patah tsadi dagesh hataf-qamats resh hiriq yod pashta

notes.note: BHL has dagesh in the tsadi. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change tipeha under the lamed to a merkha.
change.refuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh sheva lamed hiriq tipeha yod
change.changeuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh sheva lamed hiriq merkha yod

notes.note: The line under the lamed has the distinct northeast-to-southwest inclination of a merkha.
BHL has merkha under the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change tipeha under lamed to meteg. Add transcription note 'm'.
change.refuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh sheva lamed hiriq tipeha yod
change.changeuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh sheva lamed hiriq meteg yod

notes.note: The accent under the lamed is a vertical line. It is probably a merkha but will be replaced by a meteg and transcription note 'm'.
BHL has a merkha under the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva ayin tsere merkha tav maqaf
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva ayin tsere merkha tav

notes.note: BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: he qamats ayin qamats mahapakh final-mem maqaf
change.changeuni: he qamats ayin qamats mahapakh final-mem

notes.note: The text in this region has light smudges in many places. The ink of the text is dark and shows no maqaf at the end of the word.
BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move munah from bet to yod.
change.refuni: yod qamats bet munah vav holam alef
change.changeuni: yod qamats munah bet munah vav holam alef

notes.note: The accents are crowded under the yod. Plenty of space is available under the bet if that was the scribe's intention. This change is similar to that on Jer 17:8.14 below.
BHL has a qamats and munah under the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from lamed.
change.refuni: yod sheva shin shin-dot patah lamed dagesh patah munah het
change.changeuni: yod sheva shin shin-dot patah lamed patah munah het

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh in the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move munah from bet to yod.
change.refuni: yod qamats bet holam munah alef
change.changeuni: yod qamats munah bet holam alef

notes.note: This change is similar to that on Jer 17:6.7 above.
BHL has a qamats and munah under the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Replace munah under the bet with merkha.
change.refuni: vav sheva nun patah het sheva shin shin-dot sheva bet qamats munah he
change.changeuni: vav sheva nun patah het sheva shin shin-dot sheva bet qamats merkha he

notes.note: The markings under the bet are influenced by the top of a lamed on the following line. The qamats under the bet is advanced and the merkha is retarded to avoid the top of the lamed. The line under the bet has sufficient northeast-to-southwest inclination to be a merkha. The merkha line is unusually thin.
BHL has a qamats and merkha under the bet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.
Aside: The lower dot of the sheva under the shin has been overwritten by a masorah circle on the following line. BHL has a sheva under the shin.

change.description: Possible dagesh in lamed. Add note 't'
change.refuni: lamed sheva final-kaf qamats tipeha
change.changeuni: lamed sheva final-kaf qamats tipeha

notes.note: A well-positioned, well-sized, but very faint dot is apparent in the lamed. The text here is of good quality.
BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh patah yod dagesh holam lamed tsere dalet qamats meteg he sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh patah yod holam lamed tsere dalet qamats meteg he sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh in the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.
Aside: The first dot of the tsere under the lamed is very light. BHL has a sheva under the lamed.

change.description: Change zaqef qatan on kaf to revia. Add note 't.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot hiriq kaf dagesh zaqef-qatan vav holam resh
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot hiriq kaf dagesh revia vav holam resh

notes.note: The marking on the kaf lacks a sufficiently dark upper dot to be transcribed as a zaqef qatan. It will be transcribed as a revia with a 't' note.
BHL has a zaqef qatan on the kaf. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change hataf-patah on alef to patah.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot segol darga resh
change.changeuni: alef patah shin shin-dot segol darga resh

notes.note: The spot on the lower right of the alef might have been an erasure.
BHL has a hataf-patah on the alef. BHL Appendix A has a patah on the alef.

change.description: Remove dagesh from second mem.
change.refuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq mem dagesh sheva ayin mahapakh vav holam final-nun
change.changeuni: vav dagesh mem hiriq mem sheva ayin mahapakh vav holam final-nun

notes.note: The second mem has a well-centered, but very faint spot that might have been a dagesh.
BHL has a no dagesh on the first mem, it has a dagesh on the second mem. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the second mem.

change.description: Change qadma on resh to pashta on yod. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh hiriq bet sheva resh tsere qadma yod
change.changeuni: dalet dagesh hiriq bet sheva resh tsere yod pashta

notes.note: The accent starts at the top of the yod, rather than the sloping later part of the yod. Distinguishing between a qadma or pashta is difficult on such a thin letter. Pashtas occur more frequently on the final letter of a word than qadmas. Ben Denckla offers a cantillation rule: "When a qadma/pashta appears on a letter that closes a syllable and ends a word ... it should be interpreted as a pashta". Given the uncertainty and need to transcribe the accent, the accent is transcribed here as a pashta with a 't' added.

BHL has a qadma/pashta on the yod, not the resh. The difference between these two accents is hard to determine on such a thin consonant, even on a printed page. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh on bet.
change.refuni: nun hiriq bet dagesh tsere qadma yod tav qamats
change.changeuni: nun hiriq bet tsere qadma yod tav qamats

notes.note: BHL has a dagesh on the bet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Examine whether first consonant is bet or kaf. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva shin shin-dot tsere munah final-mem
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva shin shin-dot tsere munah final-mem

notes.note: The scribe doesn't distinguish very well on this page between a bet and a kaf. A kaf is extremely unlikely in this context.
BHL has a bet as the first consonant. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Severely damaged text. Add note 't'.

lc.credit: Credit: Sefaria.org. The complete LC line 18, words 9-12, are shown.

change.refuni: vav patah meteg ayin hataf-patah bet qamats dalet etnahta vav holam
change.changeuni: vav patah meteg ayin hataf-patah bet qamats dalet etnahta vav holam

notes.note: This word and the following 3 words are severely damaged, effectively unreadable. The 4 damaged words are the first 4 words on line 18 of the LC. The limitation of the damage to these 4 words is suspicious. Ben Denckla: The under marks are quite clear, however.
The UXLC text agrees with the BHL although the BHL doesn't indicate any problem with the LC text. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Severely damaged text. Add note 't'.

change.refuni: vav sheva he hiriq nun dagesh patah het sheva tav dagesh hiriq mahapakh yod
change.changeuni: vav sheva he hiriq nun dagesh patah het sheva tav dagesh hiriq mahapakh yod

notes.note: This word, the preceding word, and the following 2 words are severely damaged, effectively unreadable. The 4 damaged words are the first 4 words on line 18 of the LC. The limitation of the damage to these 4 words is suspicious. Ben Denckla: The under marks are quite clear, however.
The UXLC text agrees with the BHL although the BHL doesn't indicate any problem with the LC text. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Severely damaged text. Add note 't'.

lc.credit: Credit: Sefaria.org. The complete LC line 18, words 9-12, are shown.

change.refuni: ayin patah lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: ayin patah lamed maqaf

notes.note: This word, the 2 preceding words, and the following word are severely damaged, effectively unreadable. The 4 damaged words are the first 4 words on line 18 of the LC. The limitation of the damage to these 4 words is suspicious. Ben Denckla: The under marks are quite clear, however.
The UXLC text agrees with the BHL although the BHL doesn't indicate any problem with the LC text. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Severely damaged text. Add note 't'.

lc.credit: Credit: Sefaria.org. The complete LC line 18, words 9-12, are shown.

change.refuni: alef patah dalet sheva mem qamats tav vav holam pashta
change.changeuni: alef patah dalet sheva mem qamats tav vav holam pashta

notes.note: This word and the 3 preceding words are severely damaged, effectively unreadable. The 4 damaged words are the first 4 words on line 18 of the LC. The limitation of the damage to these 4 words is suspicious. Ben Denckla: The under marks are quite clear, however.
The UXLC text agrees with the BHL although the BHL doesn't indicate any problem with the LC text. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change gershayim above the bet to a zaqef gadol.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot qamats bet patah gershayim resh sheva tav dagesh hiriq yod
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot qamats bet patah zaqef-gadol resh sheva tav dagesh hiriq yod

notes.note: The BHL has a zaqef gadol over the bet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Severely damaged text. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: yod hiriq vav dagesh qamats dalet patah ayin pashta
change.changeuni: yod hiriq vav dagesh qamats dalet patah ayin pashta

notes.note: The UXLC text agrees with the BHL although the BHL doesn't indicate any problem with the LC text. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Examine zaqef qatan over the bet.
change.refuni: he patah nun dagesh qamats bet hiriq zaqef-qatan yod alef
change.changeuni: he patah nun dagesh qamats bet hiriq zaqef-qatan yod alef

notes.note: The text is severely damaged in this area. A zaqef qatan is a reasonable choice for the accent over the bet.
The UXLC text agrees with the BHL although the BHL doesn't indicate any problem with the LC text. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change merkha under kaf to tevir. Add 'c' note.
change.refuni: nun sheva bet hiriq meteg yod alef tsere yod kaf segol merkha final-mem
change.changeuni: nun sheva bet hiriq meteg yod alef tsere yod kaf segol tevir final-mem

notes.note: The dot on the tevir is well-sized, well-positioned, and dark; however, it is slightly brownish.
The BHL has a tevir under the kaf. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

Because the preceding word, לָכֶ֛ם, has a tevir accent, this change produces two consecutive words with tevir accents. Although these markings occur in BHL without comment, they're unexpected according to current cantillation rules. Hence, a 'c' note is added.

change.description: Remove dagesh from nun.
change.refuni: he patah meteg nun dagesh hiriq bet dagesh sheva alef hiriq merkha yod final-mem
change.changeuni: he patah meteg nun hiriq bet dagesh sheva alef hiriq merkha yod final-mem

notes.note: The BHL has no dagesh in the nun. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move zaqef qatan from over the nun to over the yod.
change.refuni: vav sheva meteg nun hiriq bet sheva nun tsere zaqef-qatan yod tav
change.changeuni: vav sheva meteg nun hiriq bet sheva nun tsere yod zaqef-qatan tav

notes.note: The lower dot of the zaqef qatan contacts the top of the yod.

The BHL and UXLC have different versification of Jeremiah chapters 30 and 31. In the BHL chapter 30 has 25 verses; the UXLC has 24 verses. BHL verse 30:25 is UXLC verse 31:1; hence this UXLC verse, 31.4, is BHL verse 31.3. The BHL has a zaqef qatan on the nun. BHL Appendix A has the zaqef qatan on the yod.

change.description: Change tipeha under alef to munah.
change.refuni: mem tsere alef segol tipeha resh segol final-tsadi
change.changeuni: mem tsere alef segol munah resh segol final-tsadi

notes.note: This is BHL Jeremiah 31:31. The BHL has a munah under the alef. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: vav sheva ayin holam merkha shin sin-dot segol he maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva ayin holam merkha shin sin-dot segol he

notes.note: The text is in good condition around this word. The space between this word and the next is slightly darker than the spaces before the current word and following the subsequent word. This may be an erased maqaf.
The BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change yetiv on lamed to mahapakh.
change.refuni: lamed holam yetiv alef
change.changeuni: lamed holam mahapakh alef

notes.note: A yetiv is prepositive, that is, a yetiv appears on the leading edge of a consonant. This accent is not prepositive and is therefore a mahapakh.
The BHL has a mahapakh on the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add revia above the yod.
change.refuni: vav dagesh bet sheva yod patah dalet
change.changeuni: vav dagesh bet sheva yod patah revia dalet

notes.note: A previous change in Changes file 2021.10.19 - Changes, change 2021.08.07 - 7, had an incorrect image for this word. The image was of word 10. The error has been corrected in the Changes file 2021.10.19 - Changes on 15 Jan 2023.
This word, 13, has a revia above the yod. The transcription note 'c' from the previous change, which was based on an incorrect image, will be removed.
The BHL has a revia above the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Consider merging this word with following word. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva nun hiriq qadma shin shin-dot sheva alef hataf-patah resh vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav sheva nun hiriq qadma shin shin-dot sheva alef hataf-patah resh vav dagesh

notes.note: No maqaf occurs at the end of this word, . The spacing between the final vav of this word and the bet of the next word, , is very small. The UXLC interprets words 9, 10 as two distinct words and adds a 't' note.

The BHL has qadma on the nun and a maqaf at the end of this word. The following BHL word, , has a zaqef qatan over the bet which would indicate the BHL poetic word (words 9, 10) has two accents; together, these two accents would represent a metigah-zaqef accent. A metigah exists only as part of a two-accent-on-a-poetic-word combination called a metigah-zaqef. The zaqef in a metigah-zaqef is always a zaqef qatan. BHL Appendix A has words (9, 10) without a space or a maqaf and a '?' mark; together, these two accents would represent a metigah-zaqef accent on the compound word.

change.description: Add dagesh to lamed. Add note 't'
change.refuni: lamed tsere alef mem holam etnahta resh
change.changeuni: lamed dagesh tsere alef mem holam etnahta resh

notes.note: The dagesh is well-positioned, reasonably dark, but oddly shaped. The region around the horizontal bar of the lamed is very dirty.
The BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Consider removing dagesh from lamed. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav patah yod sheva shin shin-dot patah lamed dagesh sheva het tsere darga final-mem
change.changeuni: vav patah yod sheva shin shin-dot patah lamed dagesh sheva het tsere darga final-mem

notes.note: The dagesh in the lamed is well-positioned, but small and faint.
The BHL has a dagesh in the lamed. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the lamed and a '?' mark.

change.description: Change patah on tsadi to qamats.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah het hataf-patah tsadi patah tipeha resh
change.changeuni: bet dagesh patah het hataf-patah tsadi qamats tipeha resh

notes.note: The dot below the horizontal line of the qamats is well-positioned, well-sized, but brownish.
The BHL has a patah under tsadi. BHL Appendix A has a qamats under the tsadi.

change.description: Change merkha to tipeha under tet.
change.refuni: lamed sheva mem hiriq qof dagesh qamats tet holam merkha final-nun
change.changeuni: lamed sheva mem hiriq qof dagesh qamats tet holam tipeha final-nun

notes.note: The BHL has a tipeha under the tet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change tsere under he to segol.
change.refuni: alef hataf-segol lamed holam he tsere munah yod
change.changeuni: alef hataf-segol lamed holam he segol munah yod

notes.note: The BHL has tsere under the he. BHL Appendix A has segol under the he.

change.description: Change merkha under het to tipeha.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah het segol merkha resh segol bet
change.changeuni: bet dagesh patah het segol tipeha resh segol bet

notes.note: The next word Jer 44:13.11 changes a tipeha to a merkha. That is, the accents on Jer 44:13.10 and Jer 44:13.11 are interchanged.
The BHL has merkha under the het. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change tipeha under ayin to merkha.
change.refuni: bet dagesh qamats resh qamats ayin qamats tipeha bet
change.changeuni: bet dagesh qamats resh qamats ayin qamats merkha bet

notes.note: The vertical line under the ayin has a very slight northeast-to-southwest inclination.
The previous word Jer 44:13.10 was changed from a merkha to tipeha. That is, the accents on Jer 44:13.10 and Jer 44:13.11 are interchanged.
The BHL has tipeha under the ayin. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move telisha qetana on kaf to yod.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh hiriq telisha-qetana yod
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh hiriq yod telisha-qetana

notes.note: The BHL has a telisha-qetana on the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change patah under mem to qamats.
change.refuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh qamats mem patah yod hiriq final-mem zinor
change.changeuni: he patah shin shin-dot dagesh qamats mem qamats yod hiriq final-mem zinor

notes.note: The BHL has patah under the mem. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva alef patah het hataf-patah resh tsere yod

notes.note: No maqaf is visible after the yod in this word. Without a maqaf, this word lacks an accent.
The BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has no maqaf at the end of this word.

change.description: Consider possible dagesh in yod. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva yod hiriq shin shin-dot sheva tet sheva pe vav dagesh pashta
change.changeuni: vav sheva yod hiriq shin shin-dot sheva tet sheva pe vav dagesh pashta

notes.note: The yod has a tail-like shape on its trailing edge. It doesn't look as though it was a dot, however.
The BHL has no dagesh on the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change zaqef gadol over first yod to zaqef qatan.
change.refuni: vav sheva tav hiriq meteg he sheva yod segol zaqef-gadol yod nun qamats he
change.changeuni: vav sheva tav hiriq meteg he sheva yod segol zaqef-qatan yod nun qamats he

notes.note: The vertical bar on the trailing edge of the zaqef qatan dots might have been part of an erased zaqef gadol.
The BHL has a zaqef qatan over the first yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from bet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah samekh dagesh segol zaqef-qatan lamed patah ayin
change.changeuni: bet patah samekh dagesh segol zaqef-qatan lamed patah ayin

notes.note: The bet has a rafe mark indicating the absence of a dagesh.
The BHL has no dagesh in the bet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Consider possible qadma over shin.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot segol resh maqaf
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah shin shin-dot segol resh maqaf

notes.note: A brownish, southeast-to-northwest line appears above the shin. It is not as close to the shin as the qadma on the alef of the next word nor is it as dark.

change.description: Add pashta over final vav.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah resh hiriq yod tsadi segol qadma nun dagesh vav dagesh
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah resh hiriq yod tsadi segol qadma nun dagesh vav dagesh pashta

notes.note: This word is in a dark spot on the page. With care, a trailing pashta can be seen on the vav.
The BHL has an accent-helper pashta over the tsadi and a pashta on the vav. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to nun.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva samekh hiriq resh sheva yod holam nun etnahta vav holam
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva samekh hiriq resh sheva yod holam nun dagesh etnahta vav holam

notes.note: The dot in the nun is well-placed, well-sized, but brownish.
The BHL has no dagesh in the nun. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh in the nun.

change.description: Change revia on pe to zaqef qatan.
change.refuni: he patah kaf dagesh patah pe dagesh revia vav holam tav
change.changeuni: he patah kaf dagesh patah pe dagesh zaqef-qatan vav holam tav

notes.note: The lower dot of the zaqef touches the top of the pe.
The BHL has revia over the pe. BHL Appendix A has a zaqef qatan over the pe.

change.description: Add dagesh and rafe to dalet. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva ayin qamats mem sheva dalet qamats tipeha final-mem
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva ayin qamats mem sheva dalet dagesh qamats rafe tipeha final-mem

notes.note: The dalet has both a dagesh and a rafe; a contradiction.
BHL has no dagesh in the dalet. BHL Appendix A has both a dagesh and a rafe on the dalet.

change.description: Add hiriq under yod.
change.refuni: bet dagesh tsere merkha yod tav
change.changeuni: bet dagesh tsere merkha yod hiriq tav

notes.note: The dot is well-sized, well-positioned, but brownish.
BHL has no hiriq under the yod. BHL Appendix A has a hiriq under the yod.

change.description: Remove dagesh from zayin.
change.refuni: tav hiriq zayin dagesh qamats kaf patah revia resh sheva final-nun qamats
change.changeuni: tav hiriq zayin qamats kaf patah revia resh sheva final-nun qamats

notes.note: The BHL has a dagesh in the zayin. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the zayin.

change.description: Add telisha qetana over shin.
change.refuni: bet dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah shin sin-dot vav holam tav hiriq yod telisha-qetana
change.changeuni: bet dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah shin sin-dot telisha-qetana vav holam tav hiriq yod telisha-qetana

notes.note: This mark serves as a "stress helper" for the postpositive telisha qetana.
The BHL has a telisha qetana over the shin. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from lamed.
change.refuni: mem tsere alef tsere meteg lamed dagesh segol he sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: mem tsere alef tsere meteg lamed segol he sof-pasuq

notes.note: The blotch in the lamed is too faint to be transcribed as a dagesh.
The BHL has a dagesh in the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh hiriq mem dagesh qamats lamed tsere mahapakh alef
change.changeuni: vav patah yod hiriq mem dagesh qamats lamed tsere mahapakh alef

notes.note: The BHL has a dagesh in the yod. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the yod.

change.description: Examine the accent under the resh.
change.refuni: shin sin-dot qamats resh tsere tipeha yod
change.changeuni: shin sin-dot qamats resh tsere tipeha yod

notes.note: The line under the resh is very, very slightly inclined southeast-to-northwest.
The BHL has a tipeha under the resh. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from lamed.
change.refuni: mem hiriq meteg lamed dagesh hiriq bet dagesh sheva he segol etnahta final-nun
change.changeuni: mem hiriq meteg lamed hiriq bet dagesh sheva he segol etnahta final-nun

notes.note: The BHL has a dagesh in the lamed. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the lamed and a '?' mark.

change.description: Remove patah from under ayin.
change.refuni: lamed sheva telisha-gedola mem patah ayin patah final-nun
change.changeuni: lamed sheva telisha-gedola mem patah ayin final-nun

notes.note: The BHL has a patah under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has no patah under the ayin.

change.description: Change first consonant from bet to kaf. Add note 'c'.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva tav patah zayin sheva nun vav dagesh tav patah tipeha yod hiriq final-kaf sheva
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva tav patah zayin sheva nun vav dagesh tav patah tipeha yod hiriq final-kaf sheva

notes.note: The text is in poor condition. The scribe doesn't always distinguish the bet and kaf carefully.
The BHL has a bet as the first letter. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.
Breuer has a kaf as the first letter.

change.description: Add maqaf to end of word.
change.refuni: ayin patah tipeha lamed
change.changeuni: ayin patah tipeha lamed maqaf

notes.note: The BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A has a maqaf at the end of the word.

change.description: Remove dagesh from yod.
change.refuni: vav patah meteg yod dagesh hiriq tav dagesh sheva nun tsere tipeha he vav dagesh
change.changeuni: vav patah meteg yod hiriq tav dagesh sheva nun tsere tipeha he vav dagesh

notes.note: The BHL has a dagesh in the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from pe.
change.refuni: pe dagesh hiriq shin shin-dot sheva ayin tsere yod kaf segol final-mem pashta
change.changeuni: pe hiriq shin shin-dot sheva ayin tsere yod kaf segol final-mem pashta

notes.note: The BHL has a dagesh in the pe. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the pe.

change.description: Change zaqef qatan on he to revia.
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah lamed tsere he segol zaqef-qatan final-mem
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah lamed tsere he segol revia final-mem

notes.note: The text is of poor quality. A dot above the revia (making it a zaqef qatan) may have been erased.
The BHL has a revia over the he. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from lamed.
change.refuni: lamed dagesh hiriq shin shin-dot sheva mem holam munah ayin patah
change.changeuni: lamed hiriq shin shin-dot sheva mem holam munah ayin patah

notes.note: The BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to qof.
change.refuni: yod hiriq tav sheva qof patah lamed dagesh sheva samekh vav dagesh maqaf
change.changeuni: yod hiriq tav sheva qof dagesh patah lamed dagesh sheva samekh vav dagesh maqaf

notes.note: The maqaf ends with a strange mark. This is the last word on the line and the mark may be intended to fill the line.
The BHL has no dagesh in the qof, it has a dagesh in the lamed, however. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove qadma from above ayin.
change.refuni: vav sheva ayin patah qadma lamed maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva ayin patah lamed maqaf

notes.note: The images shows two maqaf-connected words: . This change applies to the first word of these words, . The following word, , has a zaqef qatan on the mem.

Ben Denckla: The Unicode qadma removed here would have functioned as an accent called a "metigah". A metigah exists only as part of a two-accent-on-a-poetic-word combination called a metigah-zaqef. The zaqef in a metigah-zaqef is always a zaqef qatan. This change removes a metigah-zaqef from these two words; the poetic word formed from these two maqaf-connected words continues to have an accent, a zaqef qatan.

The BHL has no qadma on the ayin. It does have a zaqef qatan on the mem of the following word. That is, the BHL does not have a metigah-zaqef on this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to first tav.
change.refuni: tav vav holam ayin hataf-patah bet vav holam tav tsere yod he segol meteg final-nun sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: tav dagesh vav holam ayin hataf-patah bet vav holam tav tsere yod he segol meteg final-nun sof-pasuq

notes.note: The BHL has a dagesh in the first tav. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move zaqef qatan above bet to shin.
change.refuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan shin shin-dot qamats final-nun
change.changeuni: mem hiriq bet dagesh qamats shin shin-dot qamats zaqef-qatan final-nun

notes.note: The BHL has a zaqef qatan above the shin, not the bet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change munah below bet to meteg.
change.refuni: bet dagesh qamats munah ayin patah mem dagesh hiriq zaqef-qatan yod final-mem
change.changeuni: bet dagesh qamats meteg ayin patah mem dagesh hiriq zaqef-qatan yod final-mem

notes.note: The current munah is a meteg with an errant dot; it does not have munah proportions.
The BHL has a meteg under the bet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change tsere under lamed to segol.
change.refuni: lamed tsere alef mem holam meteg resh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: lamed segol alef mem holam meteg resh sof-pasuq

notes.note: The BHL has a tsere under the lamed. BHL Appendix A has a segol under the lamed.

change.description: Add dagesh to kaf. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: resh sheva kaf qubuts lamed dagesh qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia
change.changeuni: resh sheva kaf dagesh qubuts lamed dagesh qamats tav sheva final-kaf qamats revia

notes.note: The putative dagesh is well-sized, a little out of position, and brown. Note the rafe above the kaf, however.
The BHL has no dagesh in the kaf. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh in the kaf.

change.description: Changes tsere to segol.
change.refuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh tsere tipeha final-kaf sheva
change.changeuni: mem hiriq mem dagesh segol tipeha final-kaf sheva

notes.note: The lower dot of the segol is slightly displaced to the right. The size and color of the lower dot match the upper two dots.
The BHL has a tsere under the second mem. BHL Appendix A has a segol under the second mem and a '?' mark.

change.description: Change merkha under yod to tipeha.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva yod merkha vav holam final-mem
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva yod tipeha vav holam final-mem

notes.note: The BHL has a tipeha under the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Possible merkha under nun, add note 't'.
change.refuni: ayin qamats nun qamats tipeha final-nun
change.changeuni: ayin qamats nun qamats tipeha final-nun

notes.note: The near-vertical line under the first nun has a slight northeast-to-southeast inclination. This inclination isn't as great as that in the preceding word where the accent is clearly a tipeha. It's probably a meteg or merkha, but must be transcribed as a tipeha.
The BHL has a merkha under the first nun. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from nun.
change.refuni: he patah meteg nun dagesh hiriq bet dagesh sheva alef hiriq tevir yod final-mem
change.changeuni: he patah meteg nun hiriq bet dagesh sheva alef hiriq tevir yod final-mem

notes.note: The BHL has no dagesh in the nun. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add qadma over the he.
change.refuni: vav sheva he hiriq tav sheva qof patah dalet dagesh hiriq shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh hiriq zaqef-qatan yod
change.changeuni: vav sheva he hiriq tav sheva qof patah dalet dagesh hiriq shin shin-dot sheva tav dagesh hiriq zaqef-qatan yod

notes.note: Ben Denckla: The Unicode qadma added here functions as an accent called a "metigah". A metigah exists only as part of a two-accent-on-a-poetic-word combination called a metigah-zaqef. The zaqef in a metigah-zaqef is always a zaqef qatan.
The BHL has qadma over the he. It also has a zaqef qatan over the second tav; that is, BHL has a metigah-zaqef on this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: resh holam darga het patah bet maqaf
change.changeuni: resh holam darga het patah bet

notes.note: The BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change patah under vav to qamats.
change.refuni: vav patah yod sheva bet hiriq alef tsere munah nun hiriq yod
change.changeuni: vav qamats yod sheva bet hiriq alef tsere munah nun hiriq yod

notes.note: The BHL has patah under the vav. BHL Appendix A has a qamats under the vav.

change.description: Add telisha qetana to lamed. Remove note 'c'.
change.refuni: vav sheva he patah gimel dagesh sheva bet vav dagesh lamed
change.changeuni: vav sheva he patah gimel dagesh sheva bet vav dagesh lamed telisha-qetana

notes.note: The telisha qetana is very high on the lamed.
The BHL has telisha qetana on the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from bet.
change.refuni: he patah mem dagesh hiriq zayin sheva bet dagesh tsere zaqef-qatan het patah
change.changeuni: he patah mem dagesh hiriq zayin sheva bet dagesh tsere zaqef-qatan het patah

notes.note: The BHL has dagesh in the bet. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the bet.

change.description: Examine possible yod between shin and final mem.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh sheva bet qamats shin sin-dot hiriq tevir final-mem
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh sheva bet qamats shin sin-dot hiriq tevir final-mem

notes.note: Nothing seen between the shin and the final mem. The leading edge of the mem is thicker than expected, however.
The BHL has no yod between the shin and the final mem. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from first yod.
change.refuni: vav patah yod dagesh patah ayin hataf-patah bet hiriq resh tsere merkha nun hiriq yod
change.changeuni: vav patah yod patah ayin hataf-patah bet hiriq resh tsere merkha nun hiriq yod

notes.note: The BHL has a dagesh in the first yod. BHL Appendix A has no dagesh in the first yod.

change.description: Remove qadma from nun, add pashta to yod. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: pe dagesh sheva nun tsere qadma yod
change.changeuni: pe dagesh sheva nun tsere yod pashta

notes.note: The pashta/qadma accent is clearly on the yod. Pashtas occur more frequently on the final letter of a word than qadmas. Ben Denckla offers a cantillation rule: "When a qadma/pashta appears on a letter that closes a syllable and ends a word ... it should be interpreted as a pashta". Given the uncertainty and need to transcribe the accent, the accent is transcribed here as a pashta with a 't' added.

change.description: Change qamats under vav to patah.
change.refuni: vav qamats yod dagesh qamats mahapakh shin sin-dot patah resh
change.changeuni: vav patah yod dagesh qamats mahapakh shin sin-dot patah resh

notes.note: BHL has a patah under the vav. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Note possible meteg on bet. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: bet qamats alef hataf-qamats he qamats lamed hiriq tipeha yod final-mem
change.changeuni: bet qamats alef hataf-qamats he qamats lamed hiriq tipeha yod final-mem

notes.note: At question is the dark vertical line on the leading edge of the bet. It is not expected that a meteg would be written in this position. It is too low to be a paseq.
BHL agrees with the reference UXLC text. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove vav, placing holam on kaf.
change.refuni: lamed segol meteg alef hataf-segol kaf vav holam lamed pashta
change.changeuni: lamed segol meteg alef hataf-segol kaf vav holam lamed pashta

notes.note: BHL has no vav between the kaf and the lamed. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove dagesh from samekh.
change.refuni: samekh dagesh segol tipeha lamed patah ayin
change.changeuni: samekh segol tipeha lamed patah ayin

notes.note: The samekh contains a nearly-vertical, dark line on its inner left edge. It is not dot-like and unlikely to be a dagesh.
BHL has no dagesh in the samekh. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this book.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: nun sheva alef qubuts final-mem maqaf
change.changeuni: nun sheva alef qubuts final-mem

notes.note: BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this book.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: lamed hiriq bet sheva nun tsere meteg yod maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed hiriq bet sheva nun tsere meteg yod

notes.note: BHL has a maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this book.

change.description: Move meteg from yod to he.
change.refuni: he qamats yod meteg vav dagesh sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: he qamats meteg yod vav dagesh sof-pasuq

notes.note: BHL has a meteg under the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this book.

change.description: Change segol under vav to tsere. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: nun hiriq meteg yod nun sheva vav segol tipeha he
change.changeuni: nun hiriq meteg yod nun sheva vav tsere tipeha he

notes.note: The lowest of the three dots of the reference segol is well-positioned, but lighter and smaller than the upper two dots.
BHL has a tsere under the vav. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add merkha to kaf.
change.refuni: lamed sheva mem patah lamed sheva kaf tsere tipeha yod
change.changeuni: lamed sheva mem patah lamed sheva kaf tsere merkha yod

notes.note: BHL has a tipeha under the kaf. BHL Appendix A has a merkha under the kaf.

change.description: Remove qadma on the resh, add pashta to yod.
change.refuni: dalet sheva bet qamats resh patah qadma yod
change.changeuni: dalet sheva bet qamats resh patah yod pashta

notes.note: The accent on the yod in the image is clearly postpositive and, therefore, a pashta.
BHL has a pashta/qadma on the yod. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: lamed sheva bet patah merkha tav maqaf
change.changeuni: lamed sheva bet patah merkha tav

notes.note: BHL has no maqaf at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change tsere under ayin to segol.
change.refuni: vav dagesh bet qamats ayin tsere tipeha tav
change.changeuni: vav dagesh bet qamats ayin segol tipeha tav

notes.note: The lowest dot of the segol is misplaced slightly to the right of center, but has about the same size and color as the upper dots.
BHL has a tsere under the ayin. BHL Appendix A has a segol under the ayin and a '?'.

change.description: The mark under the initial mem might be a merkha. Add note 't'
change.refuni: mem sheva shin shin-dot vav holam tet sheva tet hiriq tipeha yod final-mem
change.changeuni: mem sheva shin shin-dot vav holam tet sheva tet hiriq tipeha yod final-mem

notes.note: The putative merkha is oddly shaped and thinner than most marks.
BHL has only a sheva under the initial mem. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move qadma over nun to he.
change.refuni: he patah nun dagesh hiriq qadma shin shin-dot sheva bet dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan ayin
change.changeuni: he patah qadma nun dagesh hiriq shin shin-dot sheva bet dagesh qamats zaqef-qatan ayin

notes.note: The qadma being moved is part of a metigah-zaqef accent pair.
BHL has a qadma over the he. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move tipeha under tav to under resh. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav patah alef hataf-patah mem patah resh sheva tav dagesh segol tipeha final-mem
change.changeuni: vav patah alef hataf-patah mem patah resh sheva tipeha tav dagesh segol final-mem

notes.note: Normally, accents are written after a vowel. The tipeha in the image could be considered under either the resh or the tav. Space is available after the segol to write the tipeha had the scribe intended to do so.
BHL has the tipeha under the tav positioned after the segol. BHL Appendix A has the tipeha under the tav but positioned before the segol.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: ayin patah dalet maqaf
change.changeuni: ayin patah dalet

notes.note: The image shows 3 words: , words 27, 28, 29 of Mal 3:10. This change is on word 27, . In conjunction with the subsequent change to Mal 3:10.28, this change produces three space-separated words, rather than three maqaf-separated words.

change.description: Remove maqaf from end of word.
change.refuni: bet dagesh sheva lamed hiriq yod maqaf
change.changeuni: bet dagesh sheva lamed hiriq yod

notes.note: The image shows 3 words: , words 27, 28, 29 of Mal 3:10. This change is on word 28, . In conjunction with the previous change to Mal 3:10.27, this change produces three space-separated words, rather than three maqaf-separated words.

change.description: Replace mahapakh on kaf with yetiv.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh holam mahapakh lamed
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh holam yetiv lamed

notes.note: A yetiv is prepositive, a mahapakh is centered on the consonant.
BHL has a yetiv on the kaf. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add dagesh to lamed.
change.refuni: alef hataf-segol lamed qamats he qamats alef pashta
change.changeuni: alef hataf-segol lamed qamats he qamats alef pashta

notes.note: BHL has no dagesh in the lamed. BHL Appendix A has a dagesh in the lamed.

change.description: Remove maqaf at end of word.
change.refuni: vav sheva ayin patah munah dalet maqaf
change.changeuni: vav sheva ayin patah munah dalet

notes.note: BHL has no maqaf at end of this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this word.

change.description: Remove dagesh from dalet.
change.refuni: dalet dagesh hiriq kaf dagesh tsere merkha final-nun
change.changeuni: dalet hiriq kaf dagesh tsere merkha final-nun

notes.note: The dalet has a rafe above it confirming that no dagesh is present in the dalet.
BHL has a dagesh in the dalet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

Remove pashta from final mem. Add note 't'.
Folio_102B 1 16 Credit: Sefaria.org.
יָמִ֣ים֙ yod qamats mem hiriq munah yod final-mem pashta יָמִ֣ים yod qamats mem hiriq munah yod final-mem
This change does not refer to the dark, clearly-defined tipeha above the right edge of the final mem; the tipeha belongs to the word on the previous line, Deut 5:12.7. An ill-defined diagonal stub occurs on the upper, left top of the final mem. It has a possible other remnant to the left of the sheva on the previous line. It could be a remnant of an erased pashta.
UXLC verse Deut 5:13 corresponds to BHL verse Deut 5:12. BHL has a pashta on the final mem. BHL Appendix A has no pashta on the final mem.
Add t יָמִ֣ים>
Approved accent

change.description: Change dehi on tet to tipeha (= tarḥa).
change.refuni: tet dehi vav holam bet
change.changeuni: tet tipeha vav holam bet

notes.note: The mark in the LC is not sufficiently prepositive (advanced relative to the consonant) to be transcribed as a dehi.
BHL has a tipeha (=tarḥa) on the tet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move revia back from second vav to nun.
change.refuni: vav patah geresh-muqdam yod dagesh hiriq zayin sheva nun vav dagesh revia
change.changeuni: vav patah geresh-muqdam yod dagesh hiriq zayin sheva nun revia vav dagesh

notes.note: BHL has the revia over the nun. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move mahapakh from dalet to vav. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav sheva nun qamats mahapakh dalet vav holam shin shin-dot
change.changeuni: vav sheva nun qamats dalet vav holam mahapakh shin shin-dot

notes.note: The mahapakh most likely belongs to the dalet rather than the vav. The lack of space under the dalet likely caused the shift from the dalet to vav. The mahapakh will be transcribed under the vav to represent the text image. Although the changed text places the mahapakh under the vav, fonts may place the mahapakh slightly to the left of the vav. This is the case with the Taamey D Web font here.
BHL has the mahapakh on the dalet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Note uncertain mark on pe. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: pe segol tevir lamed hiriq alef yod sof-pasuq
change.changeuni: pe segol tevir lamed hiriq alef yod sof-pasuq

notes.note: Accent below the pe should be a meteg serving as a siluq as all verses must end in a siluq.

At issue is the dot to the left of the vertical bar under the pe. The dot is well-sized and well-positioned relative to the vertical bar; the color of the dot is brownish, however. If this dot was written by the scribe, the accent would be a tevir as in the current UXLC text. The LC is in very good condition on this page and has very few scattered dots of this size and color. The UXLC continues to represent the LC image and adds a 't' note.
BHL has a meteg serving as a siluq under the pe. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove iluy from bet.
change.refuni: bet dagesh holam meteg iluy alef maqaf
change.changeuni: bet dagesh holam meteg alef maqaf

notes.note: An iluy has two sides and is more rectangular than the image's half circle above the bet. It is almost certainly a broken masorah circle referring to the masoretic note in the left text margin. The note, according to Ben Denckla, says 4 haser in the Neviim. .
BHL has a no iluy on the bet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Remove meteg from tav.
change.refuni: tav dagesh hiriq meteg he sheva yod segol merkha he
change.changeuni: tav dagesh hiriq he sheva yod segol merkha he

notes.note: The image shows very little evidence of a meteg on the tav.
BHL has no meteg on the tav. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Replace patah under ayin with sheva. Add note 't'.
change.refuni: vav patah meteg yod dagesh patah ayin patah tsadi sheva resh tsere pashta he vav dagesh pashta
change.changeuni: vav patah meteg yod dagesh patah ayin sheva tsadi sheva resh tsere pashta he vav dagesh pashta

notes.note: The text quality is poor. Neither a patah or sheva marking is clear; though a sheva is more evident. The size of this sheva is significantly smaller than that on the following tsadi.
BHL has a sheva under the ayin. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Replace sheva under qof with hataf-patah. Add 'c' note.
change.refuni: alef segol meteg qof sheva resh qamats munah alef
change.changeuni: alef segol meteg qof hataf-patah resh qamats munah alef

notes.note: The patah component of the hataf-patah under the qof is vertically offset from its normal position and slightly brownish. Many texts have only a sheva on the qof; thus a 'c' note will be added.
BHL has a hataf-patah under the qof. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.
Breuer-DM notes that the LC has a hataf-patah under the qof.

change.description: Add paseq to end of word.
change.refuni: shin shin-dot sheva mem qadma vav holam
change.changeuni: shin shin-dot sheva mem qadma vav holam space paseq

notes.note: BHL has a paseq mark ( ׀ ) at the end of this word. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Add meteg under initial alef.
change.refuni: alef qamats nun dagesh qamats munah alef
change.changeuni: alef qamats meteg nun dagesh qamats munah alef

notes.note: The meteg leads the head of the lamed of the following line and is distinct.
BHL has a meteg following the qamats under the alef. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Change mahapakh on kaf to yetiv.
change.refuni: kaf dagesh holam mahapakh lamed
change.changeuni: kaf dagesh holam yetiv lamed

notes.note: The mahapakh/yetiv mark is displaced to the right of the consonant and therefore a yetiv.
BHL has a distinct yetiv under the kaf. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Move darga from under gimel to under dalet.
change.refuni: lamed sheva mem hiriq gimel dagesh qamats darga dalet vav holam lamed
change.changeuni: lamed sheva mem hiriq gimel dagesh qamats dalet darga vav holam lamed

notes.note: BHL has the darga under the dalet. BHL Appendix A makes no comment on this verse.

change.description: Interchange qere/ketiv order (Part 1 of 2).
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah resh patah munah ayin space alef resh ayin alef
change.changeuni: alef hataf-patah resh patah munah ayin alef resh ayin alef

notes.note: The normal order qere/ketiv pairs in the UXLC is ketiv-then-qere. The order of this pair, qere-then ketiv, was incorrectly entered in change 2021.02.22 - 28 of Changes file 2021.04.01 - Changes. This change swaps the order of the two variants by merging them in change 2023.03.06 - 1 (this change) and then splitting them in change 2023.03.06 - 2 (the next change).
The combined actions of these 2 changes have the side effect of adding 2 consonant changes to the consonant changes in the Supplements/Differences result in UXLC 1.7 - UXLC 1.8.xml.

change.description: Interchange qere/ketiv order (Part 2 of 2).
change.refuni: alef hataf-patah resh patah munah ayin
change.changeuni: alef resh ayin alef alef hataf-patah resh patah munah ayin

notes.note: The normal order qere/ketiv pairs in the UXLC is ketiv-then-qere. The order of this pair, qere-then ketiv, was incorrectly entered in change 2021.02.22 - 28 of Changes file 2021.04.01 - Changes. This change swaps the order of the two variants by merging them in change 2023.03.06 - 1 (the previous change) and then splitting them in change 2023.03.06 - 2 (this change).
The combined actions of these 2 changes have the side effect of adding 2 consonant changes to the consonant changes in the Supplements/Differences result in UXLC 1.7 - UXLC 1.8.xml.
